constituent: printing, flag, towel, sword, sabre, saber
koohiiStory1: We printed a japanese flag on his white towel by stabbing him with a saber while he was wearing it.
koohiiStory2: The image that keeps coming to me is of the giant mechanical printing presses. The cloth-based material is coming off the roll like a flag and then, after printing, gets cut into sheets by saber-like cutting tools.
words:
刷り(すり): printing
印刷(いんさつ): printing
刷る(する): print, publish
